Salome is 58 years old and is married with 2 children. She has one grade of primary education. She works in agriculture but her main job is selling potatoes and vegetables in Quillacollo. She buys from the producers and then sells the produce. She has been doing this for 30 years.

So she can continue to make progress, Salome needs a loan of 7,000 BOB to buy a larger quantity of potatoes and vegetables in order to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of potatoes and vegetables.

loans.name: Meris Del Socorro

texts.es:
Gracias por apoyar a Meris, quien con su credikiva su negocio de venta de productos de belleza y cosmetología, ha mejorado porque logró comprar ofertas de productos a precios excepcionales y venderlo a su clientela fija, la cual potencializó nuevos compradores. Su vida ha cumplido con responsabilidad a sus hijos y esto la hace feliz. Ella dice a sus financiadores de Kiva 2Por personas como ustedes, hemos podido sacar adelante nuestros negocios y mejorar nuestro entorno”
Su negocio va en ascenso ahora ha adicionado servicios de internet que han potencializado la venta de productos de Belleza. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, mediante el cual comprará productos de belleza, que han llegado con precios de oportunidad y podrá captar una vez más nuevos cliente y satisfacer a sus fieles compradores.
texts.en:
Thank you for helping Meris, who has improved her business selling beauty and cosmetology products using her Kiva loan, because she was able to buy products on offer at exceptional prices and sell them to her regular clientele. This has brought in new customers. Her work life has helped her fulfil her responsibility to her children and this makes her happy.

Meris says to the Kiva lenders: "Thanks to people like you, we have been able to move our businesses forward and improve our environment." Her business is on the increase now she has added internet services, which has boosted her sales of beauty products. 

Currently Meris is applying for a Kiva loan which she will use to buy beauty products, which she has an opportunity to buy at a good price, and this will enable her to attract more new customers and satisfy her loyal regular buyers.

loans.use: to buy beauty products to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es: Silvia tiene 55 años de edad  y se dedica a la venta de artículos de miscelánea desde hace 13 años, fundamentándose en la experiencia de su familia, quien por tradición es comerciante. Los principales productos de su oferta son los vestidos, el calzado, los productos para el hogar, los accesorios femeninos etc.  Silvia realiza sus ventas a crédito la mayor parte y de contado, trabajando desde los lunes a domingos, en un horario que va desde las 8 de la mañana, hasta las 8 de la noche, mientras sus compras las realiza de contado, con una frecuencia quincenal, a mayoristas que le ofrecen precios competitivos, que él puede trasladar a sus vecinos del sector, quienes son sus principales clientes. En la actualidad Silvia está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará ropa, calzado, artículos para el hogar, entre otros artículos, determinados por la temporada navideña de fin de año, que se acerca. Su meta es hacer que su negocio sea reconocido y tenga un mayor posicionamiento, razón por la cual trabaja esmeradamente para lograrla y hacer que su inversión, producto de su credikiva, sea exitosa.
texts.en:
Silvia is 55 years old and has been selling miscellaneous items for 13 years, following her family's experience and tradition of working in retail. The main products she sells are clothing, footwear, household items and women's accessories etc. Silvia sells mostly on credit and also in cash and works from Monday to Sunday from 8 in the morning until 8 at night. She buys her stock in cash every fortnight from wholesalers who give her competitive prices, which she can pass on to the neighbours in the area who are her main customers.

Currently Silvia is applying for a Kiva loan and this is the first loan she has had from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use this to buy clothing, footwear, household items and other items for the approaching Christmas season. Her goal is for her business to be recognised and have a better position and she works diligently to achieve this and to make a successful investment out of her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy clothing, footwear, household items and other items for the Christmas season.

loans.name: Rosita Elena

texts.es:
Rosita Elena tiene 45 años de edad, vive en Piedra del Toro, una zona rural de Buenos Aires, una comunidad que se caracteriza por sus bosques de algarrobo, a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella es conocida por la venta de chicha de jora y cerveza en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para comprar abarrotes y colocar una bodeguita, lo que le permitirá tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Rosita Elena is 45 years old and lives in Piedra del Toro, a rural area in the community of Buenos Aires known for its carob tree forests and located two hours from the city of Piura on the north cost of Peru.

Rosita is known for her maize chicha and beer which she sells from home. 

She has requested a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to buy groceries and start a store which will allow her to bring in more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her store

loans.name: Anna

texts.ru:
Анна занимается продажей одежды. Она уже пользовалась микрокредитами от Надежды Украины, благодаря чему увеличила оборот товара и свой доход. 

В прошлом году у Анны был небольшой несчастный случай - она повредила ногу, когда отдыхала  на природе и некоторое время не могла торговать. Вынужденный отпуск по болезни пошел Анне на пользу и она вернулась к своему бизнесу здоровой и с новыми силами. Также, недавно сын Анны устроился на работу; теперь в их семье есть дополнительный источник дохода.

Анна надеется, что бизнес и дальше будет развиваться и приносить больше прибыли в семью. Она просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 25 000 гривен на закупку нового товара: кофты, рубашки и брюки.
texts.en:
Anna sells clothing. She has already taken out loans from Hope Ukraine thanks to which she has increased her sales volume and her income.

Last year Anna had an accident, she injured her leg while vacationing outside of town and could not work for some time. This forced medical leave did Anna some good and she came back to her business healthy and recharged. Also, just recently Anna's son started working and now their family has additional income.

Anna hopes that business will grow further and will bring more income into her family. She is asking for a loan in the amount of 25,000 hryvnia to buy new merchandise such as sweaters, shirts and pants.

loans.use: to purchase more seasonal merchandise.

loans.name: German Rudiard

texts.es: El señor German es soltero y no tiene hijos, estudia en la universidad pero no cuenta con ayuda económica de sus padres, por lo que él se mantiene solo y cubre todos sus gastos, es muy trabajador y se dedica a la producción y elaboración de pan, aun no produce grandes cantidades por que le falta un poco de capital por ello requiere un crédito de Bs. 4800 para la compra de harina e insumos para aumentar su nivel de producción y así mejorar su calidad de vida
texts.en: German is single and has no children.  He studies at the university but receives no economic help from his parents so he must cover all of his costs by himself.  He is a very hard worker and earns a living making bread, although he still cannot make large volumes because he is lacking the capital required.  That is why he is requesting a loan in the amount of 4,800 BOB to buy flour and supplies to increase production and improve his lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy flour and supplies.

loans.name: Sharafat

texts.ru: Шарафат 47 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Шарафат - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Шарафат занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Шарафат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 15 овец, 15 коз. Ежемесячный доход составляет 16,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Шарафат обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Шарафат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Sharafat is 47 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising two children. Sharafat has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Sharafat practices livestock breeding. She started this business 20 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Sharafat's hard work, she currently has on 2 milk cows, 15 sheep and 15 goats on her farm. Her monthly income is 16,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Sharafat turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Sharafat plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money for her son's wedding.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Seynakan

texts.ru: Сейнакан 60 лет, незамужем, одна воспитывает 3 детей. У Сейнакан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Сейнакан занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,500 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Сейнакан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 2 телки, 1 бычок, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Сейнакан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Сейнакан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Seynakan is 60 years old, unmarried, and is raising three children on her own. Seynakan has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Seynakan practices livestock breeding. She started this business 20 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 1,500 som (KGS). Thanks to Seynakan's hard work, she currently has on 2 milk cows, 2 calves, 1 bull and 10 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Seynakan turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Seynakan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Imigulsun

texts.ru: Имигулсун 57 лет, вдова, после смерти мужа сама воспитывает троих детей, а также ведет свое хозяйство. У Имигулсун - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Имигулсун занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Имигулсун, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 3,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Имигулсун обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Имигулсун планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Imigulsun is 57 years old and a widow. After the death of her husband, she continues to raise three children on her own. Imigulsun has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Imigulsun practices livestock breeding. She started this business 10 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Imigulsun's hard work, she currently has on 2 milk cows on her farm. Her monthly income is 3,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Imigulsun turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Imigulsun plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Juan Angel

texts.es:
Juan, es casado, vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos; es el encargado de generar los ingresos para que su familia tenga lo necesario, se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, es una actividad que aprendió desde que era un niño junto a su padre. 
Juan está preparando la reserva de alimento para su ganado en época de verano, con la inversión comprara aditivos, plástico y pagara mano de obra para la elaboración del silo de la maicillera que posee, espera que teniendo el alimento suficiente su ganado no pasara hambre en ese época seca.
Desea aumentar la producción de leche en sus vacas, pues así sus ganancias serán mayores, tendrá un negocio más productivo y dará a sus hijos una buena educación.
texts.en:
Juan is married and lives with his wife and two children.  He is the bread-winner for the family and works in agriculture and livestock farming.  He learned farming from his father when he was a little boy.

Juan is preparing the reserve of livestock feed for the summer season and with the investment he plans to buy additives and plastic and hire workers to make a silo for the corn field he has.  He hopes he will have enough feed on hand so the livestock will not go hungry during the dry season.  He wants to increase dairy production and earn more income.  This will make his business more productive so he can give his children a good education.

loans.use: To buy additives, plastic, and hire workers.

loans.name: Elmer Alirio

texts.es:
Elmer,  ha optado por otro crédito para surtir su cerrajería, comprara variedad de llaves, con las que podrá diversificar sus productos y atender mejor a sus clientes. Con el crédito anterior el surtió su inventario, dio un mejor servicio, tuvo buenas ganancias y cancelo sus deudas.
Su negocio es más amplio hoy en día ya ofrece el servicio  de instalación de alarmas de vehículo, su familia tiene un alimentación mucho mejor, todos están muy saludables.
texts.en:
Elmer is requesting another loan for his metal workshop.  He plans to buy a variety of keys so he can diversify his products and provide better customer service.  With the previous loan he stocked his business and was able to provide better service.  This increased his profit and enabled him to pay off debts.

Elmer's business has grown and now offers a vehicle alarm installation service.  His family has better food on the table and everyone is healthy.

loans.use: To buy a variety of keys.

loans.name: Esmeralda Noemy

texts.es:
Esmeralda, es una joven emprendedora que ha podido administrar de una forma adecuada los créditos, anteriormente se le facilito capital con el que ha invertido en la venta de especias y fortaleció la venta de ropa. En esta oportunidad invertirá en la compra de ropa diferentes estilos, colores y tallas, también comprara especias.
Espera que en esta época navideña sus ventas aumenten y poder generar ingresos para cancelar las cuotas, seguir ampliando su negocio.
texts.en:
Esmeralda is a young entrepreneur who has been able to manage her loans correctly.  She used a previous loan to invest in a spice business that strengthened her clothing business.  On this occasion, she will buy different styles, colors and sizes of clothing, as well as spices.

She hopes sales will increase during the Christmas season so she can earn enough to pay off debt and continue expanding her business.

loans.use: To buy clothing.

loans.name: Rysbubu

texts.ru: Рысбубу 58 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 6 детей. У Рысбубу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Рысбубу занимается животноводством, стартовав 13 лет назад, с покупки скота на 60,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Рысбубу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 теленок, 20 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Рысбубу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Рысбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение своих внуков.
texts.en: Rysbubu is 58 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising six children. Rysbubu has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Rysbubu practices livestock breeding. She started this business 13 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Rysbubu's hard work, she currently has 2 milk cows, 1 calf and 20 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 11,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Rysbubu turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Rysbubu plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money for the future education of her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Jeniffer

texts.es: Jeniffer de 23 años de edad, habita en un municipio área metropolitana de la ciudad, con su cónyuge y su pequeño hijo de 5 años. Hace 3 años, inició su actividad productiva, armando limpiones en el negocio de su padre y cuando éste, se dio cuenta de su conocimiento, le compró una máquina de coser, para que no solo los armara, sino que hiciera todo el proceso productivo y generara para ella, todo el ingreso.  Hoy elabora  con trapos, limpiones industriales, que vende por retales, a empresas productivas, de contado, trabajando de lunes a sábados, en un horario de 8 a 6 de la tarde, cesando solo en los tiempos requeridos para alimentación. Su meta es ampliar su local y mas adelante adquirir una vivienda nueva, razón por la cual planea crecer más, aunque su desafío, es la competencia del mercado, y su capacidad de comprar en mayor volumen, para obtener mejores precios, por la compra de sus materias primas e insumos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento, que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará, retales de franela, para elaborar limpiones industriales y vender en el marco de su competencia, haciendo de su credikiva una buena y oportuna inversión
texts.en:
Jeniffer, 23, lives in the metropolitan area of the city with her husband and five-year-old son.  Three years ago she started her own production of dust cloths at her father's business.  When he realized what she was capable of doing he bought her a sewing machine, not only to sew with but so she could be more productive and generate more income.

Now she makes industrial cloths out of rags and sells them to companies on a cash basis. She works Monday through Saturday from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m., only pausing long enough to eat.  Her goal is to expand her business and buy a new house in the future.  That is why she plans to expand more, although she is up against a lot of competition in the market.  She wants to increase her capacity to buy larger volumes so she can get better prices on raw materials and supplies.

Jeniffer is currently requesting her first CrediKiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, which she will use to buy pieces of flannel to make industrial cloths to sell.  The CrediKiva loan will be a good, opportune investment.

loans.use: To buy flannel.

loans.name: Eli

texts.es:
Eli tiene 32 años de edad vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Mocupe, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, arroz, comercio de animales menores y ganadería, a dos horas de la ciudad e Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa tiene un pequeño negocio en la parte posterior a su domicilio de crianza y venta de aves de corral, también se dedican a la crianza de ganado vacuno.

El ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para comprar una vaca y de esta manera ofrecer su leche en el mercado de la zona, teniendo ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Eli is 32 years old and lives with his wife in the Mocupe district.  The inhabitants here make a living growing sugar cane and rice, and selling young animals and cattle.  Mocupe is two hours away from Chiclayo, on Peru's northern coast.

Eli has a small business with his wife, which he runs out the back of his house.  Eli raises and sells poultry, as well as raising cattle.

Eli has applied for a loan of 3000 Nuevo Soles in order to buy a cow so as to be able to sell milk at the market and have an additional income for his family.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Otilia

texts.es:
Otilia, es una madre soltera de 31 años, vive con sus padres, una hermana y su hijo. Por la necesidad de generar ingresos para apoyar con los gastos de su casa y cubrir las necesidades de su hijo implemento su propio negocio, desde hace cinco años en el que elabora pupusas y diferentes antojitos, es un oficio que aprendió de su familia, lo realiza en horas de la tarde a partir de las 3:00 p.m. hasta las 9:00 p.m.
El capital lo invertirá en compra de yuca, chicharrón, quesillo, aceite y papas, todos estos ingredientes son su materia prima para que el negocio funcione sin ningún problema, es una actividad no complicada para ella pues ya tiene mucho tiempo de experiencia. 
Sueña aumentar sus ventas, generar más ingresos, cancelar bien la deuda y sobre todo construir su propia casa para que su hijo tenga un mejor ambienta habitacional.
texts.en:
Otilia is 31 years old and a single mother.  She lives with her parents, one of her sisters, and her son.  Because she needed to earn an income in order to support the family with household costs, and to buy her son's necessities, Otilia started her own business preparing "pupusas" (a corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, meat or beans) and other snacks five years ago.  She learned this trade from her family, and now works in the afternoons, from 3pm until 9pm.

Otilia will use this loan to buy yucca, pork, cheese-filled tortillas, oil, and potatoes.  All these ingredients serve as the prime materials that she needs for her business to run smoothly.  For Otilia, it is not difficult to run this business as she now has a lot of experience.

Otilia's dreams are to increase her sales and income, to pay off her debt and, above all, build her own home so that her son has a better place to live.

loans.use: to buy yucca, pork, cheese-filled tortillas, oil, and potatoes.

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es: La señora Karla Patricia se dedica a la actividad de venta de mariscos frescos desde hace 13 años  en el mercado Santa Ana, la señora es madre de tres hijas de las cuales todas estudian y se esfuerza por sacarlas adelante, trabaja de lunes a sabado desde las cinco de la mañana se viene al mercado a vender su mercaderia hasta las doce del dia. la señora Karla solicita el financiamiento para comprar pescado de pargo que es el mas caro y necesita capital para comprar al por mayor
texts.en: Karla Patricia has been selling fresh seafood in the Santa Ana market for thirteen years.  Karla is a mother to three daughters, all of whom are in school.  Karla is making a lot of effort to help them to get ahead.  She works Monday to Friday, from 5am, when she comes to the market to sell her merchandise until midday.  Karla is applying for a loan in order to buy red snapper, which is more expensive than other fish.  Karla needs capital to buy this fish in bulk.

loans.use: to buy red snappers and other fish.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Benigno Ricardo

texts.es: El señor Benigno Ricardo tiene un tramo en el mercado del bisne desde hace 17 años, el señor presta servicios de elaboracion y reparacion de calzado, en su taller tiene dos jovenes que le ayudan a realizar los trabajos, el señor es casado, de el depende un joven el cual estudia en secundaria y se esfuerza por sacar adelante a sus hijo, labora de lunes a domingo desde las siete de la mañana con mucho esfuerzo a sacado adelante su taller tiene bastante clientes que lo buscan por su experiencia, solicita el financiamiento para comprar materiales para su talelr el cual tiene un pedido y desea cubrirlo al 100%.
texts.en: Benigno Ricardo has had a stall at the Bisne market for 17 years.  There he offers services producing and repairing footwear. He has two young people who help him with the work at the workshop.  Benigno is married and has one dependent, who is currently studying in secondary school.  Benigno is putting in the effort to help his son get ahead.  Benigno works seven days a week, from 7am.  With lots of effort, his workshop has prospered and he now has many customers, who come to him for his experience.  Benigno is applying for a loan in order to buy materials for his workshop.  He has an order which he would like to fulfil completely.

loans.use: to buy leather, rubber, glue, and thread.

loans.name: Edgardo Armando

texts.es:
Edgardo, solicita capital para comprar terneros y semovientes, que criara, engordara y luego los venderá a sus clientes, con lo que ampliara su negocio, mejoraran sus ventas, y seguirá apoyando en los gastos de su casa.
Con el crédito anterior aumento su ganado lo que le facilito tener más semovientes a la venta parta que los clientes pudieran quedar más satisfechos,, su economía mejoro y el negocio se mantiene activo, su familia se encuentra muy saludable.
texts.en:
Edgardo is applying for a loan in order to buy calves and livestock, which he will raise, fatten up, and later sell to his customers.  This will help Edgardo to expand his business, improve his sales, and continue to help with household costs.

Edgardo used his last loan to buy more livestock to sell.  As a result, his customers were more satisfied, his finances improved and the business remained active. Edgardo's family is in good health.

loans.use: to buy calves and livestock.

loans.name: Sabohat

texts.ru: Двадцати восьмилетняя Сабохат начинает новую деятельность в сфере растениеводства. Она замужем и является матерью 6-летней девочки и 2-летнего мальчика. Муж Сабохат работает мастером строителем. Сама Сабохат занимается шитьем. В данный момент она собирается одновременно заняться растениеводством, как многие жители ее района Хамадони. Сам климат этого района благоприятствует ведению этой деятельности. Сабохат просит кредит и хочет арендовать орошаемый участок земли. На сумму своего сбережения она купит семена пшеницы, минеральные удобрения и топливо. Она планирует посеять пшеницу и весной получить хороший урожай. Благодаря кредиту у нее появится новый источник дохода и жизненные условия ее семьи намного улучшатся.
texts.en: Twenty-eight-year-old Sabohat is starting a new business in the sphere of crop farming. She is married and is the mother of a 6-year-old girl and two-year-old boy. Sabohat's husband is a construction foreman. Sabohat works as a seamstress. She is currently planning to simultaneously take up crop farming like many of the residents of her district, Hamadoni. The district's climate is favorable for this type of business. Sabohat is requesting a loan and wants to rent an irrigated plot of land. With her own savings she will buy wheat seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel. She plans to sow the seeds and in the Spring, receive a great harvest. Thanks to the loan, she will have a new source of income and her family's living conditions will improve greatly.

loans.use: to lease an irrigated plot of land.

loans.name: Candida Rosa

texts.es: La señora Candida Rosa se dedica a la actividad de venta de productos por catalogos desde hace 10 años, vende ambulante, su negocio lo empezo con capital propio,  ella ya tiene sus clientes quienes le solicitan pedido, la señora Candida es madre de 4 hijos de estos solo uno depende de ella,  estudia la  universidad,  se esfuerza por sacarla adelante, vende de lunes a domingo, realiza sus pedidos a las empresas y se dedica a repartir y a ofrecer sus productos, solicita financiamiento para comprar cosmeticos y perfumerias con el fin de aprovechar la temporada buena que es el mes de diciembre.
texts.en:
Candida Rosa has been selling products through catalogues for 10 years. She is a travelling vendor, and she set up her business with her own capital. She already has customers who order through her. Candida is the mother of 4 children, one of whom is still dependent and studies at university. Candida strives to progress in life, and sells from Monday to Sunday. She fulfils her orders at companies and delivers and sells her products.
She is looking for finance to buy cosmetics and perfume in order to make the most of December, which is a good season for sales.

loans.use: to buy a variety of perfumes, talc, colognes, cosmetics and clothes.

loans.name: Kartlos

texts.en: Kartlos is a 51-year-old married man, who lives in the village of Kanda with his wife, son, daughter-in-law and grandchildren. Kartlos runs a pig farm and sells piglets seasonally. He works hard all day long to earn his living, but his existing income is not enough to cover food and everyday expenses. That is why Kartlos decided to start another business. He applied for credit from MFO Credo. His request was approved under the startup loan program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva. This program enables the vulnerable poor to start or re-start businesses. A loan of $3,000 will help Kartlos to purchase a minibus. Kartlos will work on the minibus line as a driver and transport passengers from his district to the capital city. The new business initiative will significantly increase the family funds. With the increased income, the family will be able to increase their daily spending and improve their living standard in future.

loans.use: to purchase a minibus and start working on the minibus line.

loans.name: Rawyah Group

texts.en:
Sanaa is the featured borrower of Rawyah's group. She joined with her other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua. They have always been neighbors and friends.

Sanaa is a 27-year-old married mother of two children. She has been working as a hairdresser for five years. Two years ago, she started her own business, which she runs from home. It's developing gradually and most of her clients recommend her to friends and relatives.

Sanaa is the lady sitting in the middle. She is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary tools and machines requested for developing her business.

As for the other group members, Rawya is the first from the left, she is 21 years old, and Wafaa, who is 38 years old, is the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy necessary tools and machines requested for developing her business.

loans.name: Kholiskhon

texts.en: Kholiskhon is a 38-year-old woman. She has 3 wonderful children, two sons and one daughter. They live in a small, rural area.  For a long time, her husband has been working as an immigrant in the Russian Federation. Money that he was sending wasn’t enough so Kholiskhon started a new business of cattle breeding.  She has been doing this for 4 years and now she is very experienced and strong. She buys cattle, raises them and sells them. She asks for the loan, because she wants to buy a plane ticket for her husband.

loans.use: to buy an air ticket for her husband.

loans.name: Eveline

texts.en:
Eveline is married and has two children both of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for her children. 

For the past year, Eveline has operated a poultry business, selling chicks at the market to her neighbors and town dwellers. She faces a major challenge of disease attack in her business. 

Eveline is requesting a loan to purchase more chicks and feeds for the chicks for the business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks and feeds for the chicks for the business.

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en:
Rachael is 55 years old from Olkalou. She is married to David who is a businessman and they are blessed with three children 32, 29 and 25 years old.

Rachael is a farmer who grows crops like wheat, maize, potatoes, beans and sweet potatoes. She has been running this business for the last six years. To enable her to hire a tractor to plow her land in readiness for the next planting season and to also purchase some wheat planting seeds, she has applied for her third loan of KES 30,000 from KADET.

From her farming activities, Rachael makes a monthly income of KES 20,000 and she intends to use profits from her expanded business to build rental houses on a plot of land. She hopes to be the most successful farmer in her area.

loans.use: to boost her farming activities by hiring a tractor to plow her farm and to buy some wheat planting seeds.
